trans-unit.source: For downloads, documentation, installation instructions, changelog, and feature list, please visit the product page at:
trans-unit.target: 有关下载、文档、安装说明、变更日志和功能列表,请访问产品页面:。

trans-unit.source: It comes with an easy to use installer that includes the most recent OpenSSL library versions in pre-compiled form and also ships with the most recent certificate authority (CA) bundles from Mozilla, together with a support module to make using the bundles easy in pyOpenSSL.
trans-unit.target: 它提供了一个易于使用的安装程序,其中包含了最新的OpenSSL库版本的预编译形式,同时还提供了Mozilla最新的证书授权(CA)捆绑包,以及一个支持模块,使得在pyOpenSSL中使用这些捆绑包变得简单。

trans-unit.source: OpenSSL is distributed under the OpenSSL license.

The eGenix.com pyOpenSSL Distribution includes everything you need to get started with OpenSSL in Python, based on the fine pyOpenSSL package that is available from Launchpad at https://launchpad.net/pyopenssl/.
trans-unit.target: eGenix.com的pyOpenSSL发行版包含可从启动板（https://launchpad.net/pyopenssl/）获得的高级pyOpenSSL软件包，其中包括在Python中使用OpenSSL入门所需的一切 。

trans-unit.source: The source package on the Python Package Index (PyPI) is a web installer, which will automatically select and download the right binary package for your installation platform.
trans-unit.target: Python包索引(PyPI)上的源码包是一个网络安装程序,它会自动选择并下载适合你安装平台的二进制包。

trans-unit.source: This distribution is brought to you by eGenix.com and made available under the eGenix.com Public License 1.1.0.
trans-unit.target: 本发行版由 eGenix.com 带来,并以 eGenix.com Public License 1.1.0 提供。

trans-unit.source: This product includes cryptographic software written by Eric Young (eay@cryptsoft.com). This product includes software written by Tim Hudson (tjh@cryptsoft.com). This product includes software developed by the OpenSSL Project for use in the OpenSSL Toolkit. (http://www.openssl.org/)
trans-unit.target: 该产品包括由Eric Young编写的加密软件（eay@cryptsoft.com）。本产品包括由Tim Hudson编写的软件（tjh@cryptsoft.com）。该产品包括由OpenSSL Project开发的，用于OpenSSL Toolkit的软件。（http://www.openssl.org/）

trans-unit.source: This source package does not include the crypto code, so it’s safe to download and distribute. Before downloading the crypto code archives, the web installer will ask for confirmation of the export regulations that apply to the code.
trans-unit.target: 此源程序包不包含密码，因此可以安全下载和分发。在下载加密代码档案之前，网络安装程序将要求确认适用于该代码的出口法规。

trans-unit.source: You can also compile pyOpenSSL yourself. For Windows, we include all necessary OpenSSL build files to make this easy for you. On other platforms, you just need to install the OpenSSL library (including the development headers) to compile from source.
trans-unit.target: 你也可以自己编译pyOpenSSL。对于Windows,我们包含了所有必要的OpenSSL构建文件,以方便你。在其他平台上,你只需要安装OpenSSL库(包括开发头文件)就可以从源码编译。

trans-unit.source: pyOpenSSL is distributed under the Apache License 2.0.
trans-unit.target: pyOpenSSL 是在 Apache License 2.0 下发布的。

trans-unit.source: pyOpenSSL was originally written by Martin Sjoegren for AB Strakt and is now maintained by Jean-Paul Calderone.
trans-unit.target: pyOpenSSL最初由Martin Sjoegren为AB Strakt编写,现在由Jean-Paul Calderone维护。
